metadata.title: CVE-2022-48741 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ovl: fix NULL pointer dereference in copy up warningThis patch is fixing a NULL pointer dereference to get a recentlyintroduced warning message working.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
